title: Packet Journey - Network Latency Visualization
description: Interactive visualization showing how all four latency components (transmission, propagation, processing, and queuing) accumulate at each hop in a network path
features: Complete latency modeling with all four components
Multiple network presets (home, gaming, satellite, enterprise)
learningObjectives: Understand the four components of network latency
See how latency accumulates across network hops
Learn how different network types affect latency
Understand the relationship between packet size and transmission delay
